components.name: DockerContainer
components.description: Base class for managing Docker containers used in the build and deployment processes.

components.name: BuilderContainer
components.description: Handles the building of Ray applications within a specified container environment.

components.name: Validator
components.description: Abstract class for validating builds and configurations across different platforms.

components.name: Automation Scripts
components.description: Scripts that automate various CI/CD tasks such as version updates, Docker image management, and dependency checks.

components.name: Documentation Generator
components.description: Generates API documentation and checks for discrepancies in API annotations.

data_flows.description: The BuilderContainer builds application artifacts and sends them to the DockerContainer for deployment.
Automation scripts trigger validation processes to ensure builds meet specified criteria.
The Documentation Generator retrieves API information to create and update documentation.

trust_boundaries.name: Build Environment
trust_boundaries.description: The boundary that separates the build process from external systems and repositories.

trust_boundaries.name: Validation Process
trust_boundaries.description: The boundary that ensures only validated builds are deployed to production.
